Trash Inc: Ndụ Nzuzo nke mkpofu bụ ihe nkiri ihe nkiri telivishọn na-ewe otu awa nke ewepụtara na CNBC na Septemba 29, 2010 gbasara ahịhịa / ahịhịa, ihe na-eme ya mgbe a "tụfuru" ya, yana mmetụta ọ na-enwe n'ụwa. Onye na-akwado ihe nkiri ahụ bụ CNBC Squawk Box bụ Carl Quintanilla ka ọ na-akọ akụkọ site na ebe a na-ekpofu ahịhịa dị iche iche (dị ka nke kachasị na United States, Apex Landfill na Clark County, Nevada), azụmahịa, na ebe ndị ọzọ na United States (New York, New Jersey, Hawaii, South Carolina) na China (karịsịa Beijing).
Echiche maka Trash, Inc sitere na ndalata akụ na ụba nke afọ 2008 na nkwụsi ike nke ụlọ ọrụ nchịkwa mkpofu na-ere ahịa n'ihu ọha.
